bio.value: Teddy Slater is the author of over 100 children's books, including Smooch Your Pooch, The ABC Sing-Along, Llamas in Pajamas, The Wrong-Way Rabbit and N-O Spells No. Her latest book is Dottie and the Dog Show. Teddy and her husband, Fred, live on a farm in upstate NY with their good dog, Barkly.
